Articles.Content:
The Xenon JetGlider is pretty much exactly what it sounds like. It\'s stable, it\'s fast, and it could probably go into space with some modifications. I can\'t promise anything if you modify it though.

IMAGES: [http://imgur.com/a/6c3YW#0](http://imgur.com/a/6c3YW#0)

Sadly, I don\'t know how to land a spaceplane, so I can\'t tell you if it\'s possible to land it. If anyone does land it, tell me!
